summary: Get yer fence's here! We've got all your fence needs covered. Take a look, you're bound to find something you'll like.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][color=#ff7700][size=4]Attention: This mod is no longer being supported or updated.[/size]

This mod has been uploaded by "The Care Taker" at the request of its owner. The Care Taker account is run by Nexus Mods for the purpose of hosting mods created by authors who are no longer active in the community.

If you are a mod author and would like to learn more about this service or have questions, you can find details regarding The Care Taker [url=https://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/5792517-the-care-taker/]HERE[/url].

Happy modding![/color][/b][/center]

[center][size=5][u]Steveowashere's Fence Emporium[/u]

[/size][size=3][u]Get all yer fences here![/u][/size]

[size=3]It always bothered me Skyrim had one fence style.
Everyone in Skyrim made fences in the exact same way I guess, it was the time-honored art of fence cloning.  
I don't think so.

I made a few variations of fences to fix this.
The plan was to make a mod that added these throughout Skyrim.
I haven't gotten around to that yet, so I am releasing them as a resource.
Let there be fences throughout Skyrim!

You can use this for whatever you wish!
Please don't make money off of it however.
The fences in this mod are the same size as vanilla fences, so simply find and replace with whatever you like.

This is not meant for installation via mod organizer! 
However, if you want to use a fence as a replacement, you can install it manually.


Enjoy!


[img]http://i.imgur.com/PUFfKr5.png[/img]

"I'll Take it!' 

 - Elianora, 2016

[url=http://wiki.step-project.com/Guide:Open_Modding][img width=748,height=92]http://i.imgur.com/dhy1tdz.png[/img][/url]

[/size]Credits to NifSkope Team & Bethesda & Nexus [/center]
author: steveowashere
